name: I Can't Jump
description:
You wake up one morning to find you can’t jump. The only way to let you jump again is to find a mysterious witch who lives in a cave in the mountains. Travel across Purity Planes to find the mountains while dodging the strange “cactus stubbies” and solving puzzles. Will you ever jump again?

Note: Don’t get discouraged if you seem to be failing or keep dying. Since this game is short, it has a couple of hard levels that you’re meant to fail at so you can keep trying and eventually complete it.

If this game gets good enough ratings, I will make a full version of this game with a lot more enemies, bosses, and a story line!
